text: <@UDFTHC6PK> was awesome enough to add normalize and fontawesome to the framework. For those worried about bloat these are optional via HubL vars in theme-variables.css

In other news I added a drag n drop version of the Bones template, thanks to the new <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development>
<https://github.com/TheWebTech/CrankShaft/tree/master/CrankShaft/templates/page>
yes! I was just wanting to start playing in that direction and modules.
